|brand = Leichu |model = ALPHALAN-2000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = DSSS |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = d601 |device_id = 0001 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NZO-ALPHALAN2000 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:60:B3
|chip1 = AMD;Am79C930; |chip2 = Harris;HSP3824; |chip3 = Harris;HFA3724; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = legacy (DSSS) |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/13/1998 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card identifies in Windows as a... *'''<small>PCMCIA\OEM-WLAN/WPCMCIA-590A</small>''' *'''<small>PCMCIA\OEM-WLAN/WPCMCIA-D601-0001</small>'''
The datasheet for the HSP3824 is included in the filing as 'Harris Chips Information'.
The technical specifications in the FCC filing are fairly informative. *Processor: AMD80188-20 (Embedded) *MAC: Am79C930 *Core Logic (DSP): Harris 3824 / 3724 *Memory: 32KB SRAM *Flash: 128KB
The manual indicates that two models were produced... *AlphaLAN 2000 P **Patch antenna **It appears this card was resold by '''ELSA''' / '''LANCOM''' as the MC-2. *AlphaLAN 2000 D **Dipole antenna (presumably via RP-SMA connector) **for use in an AP ***the AP is noted as using an ElanSC400
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:Leichu ALPHALAN-2000 top.jpg| File:Leichu ALPHALAN-2000 bot.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
